TUBN.MX.summary: Tubacex, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture, supply, and sale of tubular seamless stainless steel, high-nickel alloy, and nickel superalloy tubular products worldwide. The company offers stainless steel tubes; mechanical tubes; square and round bars, rolled and forged billets, and ingots; fittings and special components, such as welding fittings, curved sections, elbows, tees, reducers, and caps; and Tubacoat, a ceramic coating for long steel and high-nickel alloy products. Its products are used in oil and gas exploration and production; hydrocarbon processing; fertilizer; power generation; aerospace; and other industries. The company was founded in 1963 and is headquartered in Llodio, Spain.
